HeroSection.title: Transforming the insurance sector
HeroSection.subtitle: SegurNeo builds, scales, and co-founds innovative solutions in the insurance sector

VentureStudioSection.paragraph1: At Segurneo, we bridge the gap between the insurance sector's tradition and the limitless possibilities of digital transformation. Our team combines deep insurance expertise with a strong command of the most advanced technologies.
VentureStudioSection.paragraph2: On one hand, our technology consulting branch develops tailored solutions that address specific business needs. We boost operational efficiency, enhance customer experience, and accelerate the digitalization of insurers and distributors.
VentureStudioSection.paragraph3: On the other hand, we explore and create new business models. We collaborate closely with insurers and distributors to co-create the future of the sector. As a venture studio, we don't just design solutions: we build companies. We share the risk and reward of entrepreneurship, working side-by-side with our partners to transform the sector from within.

ProjectsSection.title: Explore our solutions
ProjectsSection.paragraph: We create solutions from different angles: B2C, B2B, and B2B2C. We have developed online comparators, payment systems adapted to insurance operations, and AI virtual agents that automate customer service without losing the human touch.
ProjectsSection.project1Desc: Native health insurance distribution broker with Artificial Intelligence.
ProjectsSection.project2Desc: Payment platform adapted to the insurance sector. Manages non-payments, collections, and invoices automatically.
ProjectsSection.project3Desc: Artificial intelligence solution that optimizes customer service in call centers. Reduces waiting times, increases margins, and improves satisfaction.

ProductFeatureSection.title: Digitize your business
ProductFeatureSection.paragraph: Automate manual work, so you can focus on growing your business
ProductFeatureSection.feature1Desc: Instant, personalized 24/7 responses via voice, email, and Whatsapp. Improve customer satisfaction and your margins.
ProductFeatureSection.feature2Desc: Automate and optimize collections management with AI, improving recovery rates by up to 40%.
ProductFeatureSection.feature3Desc: Reduce management time by 70% with AI. Faster and more accurate responses for each case.
ProductFeatureSection.feature4Desc: Allow your customers to pay with their preferred payment method, increasing conversion and reducing operational costs.
